Plot: In Canton, Mississippi, a fearless young lawyer and his assistant defend a black man accused of murdering two white men who raped his 10-year-old daughter, inciting violent retribution and revenge from the Ku Klux Klan.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 7 wins & 11 nominations.
Title: A Time to Kill
Actors: Matthew McConaughey, Sandra Bullock, Samuel L. Jackson, Kevin Spacey
